replies.body: the real preseason 10 is the resolve tree getting removed in favor of domination part two: burst damage boogaloo

Sorcery will be filled with even more movement speed.

- Arcane Comet no longer does damage. Now it marks enemies hit and grants you ~~20%~~ ==> 30% MS (Hotfixed 04/01/2019)  towards them.
- Summon Aery no longer shields or does damage. Now it increases allied movement speed or decreases enemy movement speed by 15%.
- Gathering Storm reworked, now gives +3% MS at 10 minutes, 6% at 20, 12% at 30, etc.
- Absolute Focus reworked, now gives +5% MS while above 70% health.
- Manaflow Band no longer regenerates mana fully stacked, it instead now grants bonus movement speed equal to 0.005% of your maximum mana
- Transcendence no longer grants +10% CDR or adaptive stats beyond the cap. Bonus CDR beyond the cap now grants 2% bonus movement speed per 10%.
- Scorch no longer does damage. It now grants 10 - 30 flat movement speed on ability hit (cooldown unchanged).
- Nullifying Orb unchanged, no need to touch this one since it already fits in with "empowered abilities and resource manipulation".
